item.title: Npcs
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“belhelmiel, post:7, topic:383124”][quote author=x1 att ftw x link=topic=478903.msg3506141#msg3506141 date=1298167179]
well this is my code now

if(NPCID == 556) && playerHasItem(995,50000000) { talk("The Key Costs 50m!", 556); addItem(3841, 1); sM("He Gives You A Key!."); break; } but i get this error…

[IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/sexy.png[img]
[/quote]
i can help you with some of this (the second error)
for the

playerHasItem(995,50000000) {

part put this

playerHasItem(995,50000000); {

LOL that was easy the compiler told you what to do
NEVER doubt your compiler unless it says 100 errors
then you forgot to put a } or put a { instead of } lol…

BTW I’m on a hunt for rep++ so if possible REP++ MEE FOR ME HELPING!!! thank you[/quote]
You idiot. Even with a limited amount of knowledge to Java myself, I can read this and safely say you are very stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Everything I am about to say here does not apply to Medorphins.

You guys are all so stupid! You make me want to kill myself!

Holy crap, I don’t understand why people help if they have no idea what the fuck they are talking about!

Proper code:

if(NPCID == 556 && playerHasItem(995,50000000)) { talk("The Key Costs 50m!", 556) addItem(3841, 1); sM("He Gives You A Key!."); }

Now don’t reply to this thread again, I never want to have to see it.

Read full topic

talk(“The Key Costs 50m!”, 556);
addItem(3841, 1);
sM(“He Gives You A Key!.”);
break;
}

item.title: Npcs
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Delete it and just use a single closing bracket. I’m pretty sure you’d only use that if you was using a switch statement (case 1:, case 2: etc.).

If it works though, meh.

I just don’t think it will properly close your statement, causing long term problems in your code.

Read full topic
